title: ArumukhanukkiNai yArum
sahitya:
ArumukhanukkiNai yArum tuNai UNDO pAril bhaktarip-pAlittu varuvadil


anupallavi

  sIruDan cendUril sirandiDum vaLLal sIrum alaikaDal Oram kuDi koLLum


caraNam    nAriyar iruvarin nAthan Aghum avan sArum aDiyArin tArakan AvAnE
Eru mayil vAhanan ezhil mighu mOhanan kOrum varam uDanE koDuttu udaviDum
